name: Uxie
author: Ryo Ueda
flavor_text: Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

poke_power.name: Memory Out
poke_power.effect: Once during your opponent’s turn, if Uxie is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if Uxie is Knocked Out), you may use this power. The Attacking Pokémon can’t use that attack during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Mind Off
attacks.effect: If you have Mesprit and Azelf in play, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
